Content:: Karunarathna Paranawithana (born 2 June 1968) is a Sri Lankan politician, current member of parliament for Ratnapura district and deputy minister of Provincial Council and Local Government.[1][2] He previously served as secretary to the Ministry of Mass Media before resigning to contest from UNP-led alliance the UNFGG in the parliamentary polls.[3]  This article about a politician from Sabaragamuwa Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Karu Paranawithana - Wikipedia
